sn45.56:4.1: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.
sn45.56:4.3: In the same way good friendship is the forerunner and precursor of the noble eightfold path for a mendicant.
sn45.56:4.5: A mendicant with good friends can expect to
sn45.56:4.6: develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path.
sn45.56:4.7: And how does a mendicant with good friends develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path?
sn45.56:4.8: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness,
sn45.56:4.9: and right samādhi culminating in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion.
sn45.56:4.10: That’s how a mendicant with good friends develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
